presentation.resume: I am starting in the IT world as a Full Stack Developer, and I really want to learn

languageSelection.text: In what language do you want to download the curriculum?

ssr: Analyze the infrastructure of the projects focusing on scalability and performance
Implementation and monitoring of alarms and metrics in Datadog for process monitoring and application scalability
jr: Creation of new applications applying good practices and design patterns using Java and Go

mentor: Organization of daily and retrospective meetings to evaluate the progress of the team within the SCRUM framework
Evaluate and highlight strengths and improvement points of team members
cra: Attend the resolution of exercises and promote group collaboration
Preparation and presentation of technical exercises

projects.title: My projects
projects.subtitle: These are some of the projects I have worked on
projects.Henry-World-Web: Henry World web version in which administrators and teachers can make changes more conveniently and quickly
projects.Henry-World-App: Mobile version of Henry World that works as a virtual campus, in which students can enter to see their classes, their groups, teachers and more
projects.Wultur: E-commerce on programming courses in which you can buy products, rate them and add or delete being an administrator
projects.Mercado-Henry: Mercado Libre clone, where you can see the specification of the products brought by its API
projects.Poke-Page: Pokedex in which you can review all the pokemons with their details, the different pokedex, regions and pokemon movies
projects.footer: If you want to see all my projects visit my Github
